newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Hamas threatens more attacks against Israel.
newsitem.headline: Hamas threatens more attacks against Israel.

text.p: The militant Moslem group Hamas threatened on Saturday more attacks against Israel if the Jewish state continued to build a settlement in Arab East Jerusalem.

"The persistence of the Zionists to build the dirty settlement on Jabal Abu Ghneim will commit us to continue our attacks, striking against the Zionists," said a statement faxed to an international news agency by Hamas' military wing.
An anonymous caller to Israeli police on Friday said Hamas claimed responsibility for the suicide bombing of a Tel Aviv cafe that killed three Israelis.
The faxed statement on Saturday referred to the attack as "a wonderful martyrdom operation".

"We do not need much effort to prove our truthfulness and seriousness of our threats...to teach the arrogant (Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin) Netanyahu a lesson he will not forget for days and years," said the statement signed "Iz el-Deen al-Qassam Brigades, Hamas Movement Military Branch, Jerusalem - Occupied Palestine".

It said that "whoever thinks that the flame of Jihad (holy struggle) and resistance will one day be extinguished is mistaken...for the choice of Jihad and resistance is not an interim choice but a strategic one".
